channel.title: capistrano on Dead Programmer SOciety

item.title: So Long, And Thanks For All The SSH
item.description: I read Jamis Buck’s posting late last night, about how he was retiring from involvement with Capistrano, Net:SSH and a few other closely related projects. First of all, the community owes him a lot for doing so much work on these crucial parts of the Ruby on Rails ecosystem. Seems like he has fallen victim to his own project’s popularity. So many people using your code, and they start to expect things, and then demand them.
